title: Silver 4 Mid Laner Looking for Serious Ranked 5's
body: Hello my name is BurstFire303 and I main mid but I can play all roles. Though this account does not own all champions, I have enough to form decent champ pools. My main account BurstFire301 (http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=burstfire301) was banned because of a payment issue. The highest ranks I have ever been is Gold 1 in soloQ and silver 3 in ranked 5's. I have extensive ranked 5's experience playing with and vs diamonds/plats. Please add me in game if you have any questions or you would like to recruit me.
